text: Whenever it shall appear to the Commissioner that the records of any insurer in process of liquidation or completely liquidated are no longer useful, he or she may recommend to the court, and the court shall direct, what records should be retained for future reference and what records should be destroyed.

DC CODE § 31-1346

heading.catch_text: Disposition of records during and after termination of liquidation.
